about_the_game:
About:


🤍New episodes in the world of 'My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into!' Discover new sides to the cast and enjoy the story from different perspectives.🤍

  • Includes three Episodes: 'Episode Amy','Episode Mafuyu', and 'Happier Days', featuring hours of content.
  • New CGs, backgrounds, portraits, music, and some secrets to uncover.
  • Your choices matter: follow the different routes and possibilities that unlock based on your decisions.
  • Aim to see all endings to unlock the True End and more episodes.
  • Overall, adds 20k+ words of content!

How to play:


Another Episode is add-on DLC. Upon downloading it, a message will appear on the bottom left of MyGF's main menu that the DLC has been installed.

Access the new content by opening the 'Extras' menu, directly from the base game, unlocked after you've seen the original True Ending.

On translations:


Another Episode is only available in English and Brazilian Portuguese at the moment.

About Meiri Games:


I'm a solo Brazilian game developer who enjoys making cute horror games. MyGF is my first Steam release! I hope you enjoy the new episodes of this short adventure. Your purchase will help me create more games with actual budgets!
